fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Check for seed**: Give the Minecraft(Head) role a seed.
**Lay Egg**: Give the Minecraft(Head) role an egg.
**Hatch Egg**: If the Minecraft(Head) role has an egg, hatch the egg, replacing your scum-shield and giving the Minecraft(Head) role Chicken.
**Peck Target**: Peck the target, causing them to be unable to use there ability last night

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If killed, the Minecraft(head) role gains an egg, a chicken, and a feather.
- If you get attacked, you can once per game glide to the house your visiting, not dying.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Slay all else and turn them into gear
